name: Bagels
overview: Bagels is a electronic version of the number guessing game "Pico, Fermi, Bagels", similar to Mastermind or Jotto, where the player must guess the computer's secret number. After guessing the secret, the computer will give you hints based on whether the digit is wrong, correct or correct but in the wrong place. You get tho choose any number of digits from 3 to 9, inclusive.
